title: Secret documents reveal military chiefs ordered urgent UFO probe after mysterious sighting
description: MILITARY intelligence officials ordered staff to probe into UFO tech amid fears alien craft could outmanoeuvre planes. Secret documents revealed in the National Archives show the mysterious sightings being treated with critical importance in the 1990s. One internal Ministry of Defence memo from 1997 calls them unidentified aerial phenomena (UAPs). It says: “If significant numbers...

title: UK ordered agents to find UFO tech in bombshell 1990s secret files shocker
description: The British military actively tried to obtain extraterrestrial technology in the 1990s, intelligence officers believing the otherworldly innovations could bolster the country's own defense capabilities, shocking once-secret files reveal.

title: Defence chiefs hoped to re-build Britain's military using alien UFO technology
description: Officials were told to hunt down 'extraterrestrial' tech so they could copy it on the battlefield, according to secret declassified files
